summary: An email from attorney Robert Glassman to an unnamed recipient, with copies to Nathan Werksman and Keilah Betts, transmitting a Touhy request for tangible and documentary evidence in the civil case Jane Doe v. Indyke et al. The email indicates the request is related to litigation involving Epstein associates.

events.title: Touhy Request Transmission
events.description: Attorney Robert Glassman sends an email transmitting a Touhy request for tangible and documentary evidence in the civil case Jane Doe v. Indyke et al.

locations: 11111 Santa Monica Boulevard, Suite 700 (Panish Shea & Boyle LLP office)
keyFacts: The document is an email dated June 8, 2020, from attorney Robert Glassman transmitting a Touhy request for evidence.
The request is related to the civil litigation 'Jane Doe v. Indyke et al.,' SDNY Case No. 1:20-cv-00484-JGK-DCF.
The primary recipient's name is not visible in the provided text, suggesting it may be redacted or omitted.
The email was sent with 'High' importance and had multiple attachments.
The correspondence originates from the law firm Panish Shea & Boyle LLP in Los Angeles.
